models.notifications: Each notification represents an alert or reminder sent to users about certification expirations, renewals, team member certifications, or compliance issues. Notifications track read/dismissed status and include contextual information about the related certification.
models.notificationSettings: User preferences for how and when they want to receive notifications, including frequency intervals and delivery channels.

relationships: Each Notification belongs to a User (identified by userId and userName)
Each Notification relates to a UserCertification (referenced by certificationName and userCertificationId)
NotificationSettings define user preferences that control when Notifications are generated and delivered

notifications.title: AWS Solutions Architect Expiring in 15 Days
notifications.description: Your AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate certification expires on February 5, 2025. Take action now to avoid gaps in your credentials.

notifications.title: Time to Renew Your CISSP Certification
notifications.description: Your CISSP certification expires in 45 days. Start your renewal process to maintain your credential.
notifications.certificationName: CISSP - Certified Information Systems Security Professional

notifications.title: Team Member Certification Expiring Soon
notifications.description: John Martinez's CompTIA Security+ certification expires in 22 days. Follow up to ensure renewal is in progress.

notifications.title: Compliance Level Dropped Below Threshold
notifications.description: Your certification compliance has fallen to 75%, below the required 80% threshold. Immediate action needed.

notifications.title: Azure Administrator Certification Expiring in 60 Days
notifications.description: Your Microsoft Azure Administrator Associate certification expires on March 21, 2025. Plan your renewal to maintain your credential.

notifications.title: ITIL 4 Foundation Renewal Coming Up
notifications.description: Your ITIL 4 Foundation certification expires in 90 days. This is a lifetime certification, but it's a good time to pursue advanced ITIL credentials.

notifications.title: CompTIA Network+ Expiring in 10 Days
notifications.description: Urgent: Your CompTIA Network+ certification expires on January 30, 2025. Upload your renewal documentation immediately.

notifications.title: Multiple Team Certifications Expiring This Month
notifications.description: 3 team members in Cloud Infrastructure have certifications expiring within 30 days. Review and take action.

notifications.title: Google Cloud Architect Certification Renewal
notifications.description: Your Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect certification expires in 50 days. Schedule your recertification exam.

notifications.title: Terraform Associate Expiring in 35 Days
notifications.description: Your HashiCorp Certified: Terraform Associate certification expires on February 25, 2025. Begin your renewal process.

notifications.title: Team Compliance Status Update Required
notifications.description: The Cloud Infrastructure team's compliance rate has dropped to 82%. Update certification records to maintain compliance.

notifications.title: CKA Certification Renewal Window Open
notifications.description: Your Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) certification expires in 75 days. The renewal window is now open.

notifications.title: CEH Certification Expiring in 18 Days
notifications.description: Your Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) certification expires on February 8, 2025. Complete your continuing education credits now.

notifications.title: Team Member Completed Certification Renewal
notifications.description: Sarah Chen successfully renewed her AWS Solutions Architect certification. Team compliance updated.

notifications.title: Azure Data Engineer Renewal Approaching
notifications.description: Your Microsoft Azure Data Engineer Associate certification expires in 42 days. Prepare for your renewal assessment.

notifications.title: CISM Certification Expiring in 55 Days
notifications.description: Your Certified Information Security Manager (CISM) certification expires on March 17, 2025. Ensure you have 40 CPE credits.

notifications.title: Urgent: Quarterly Compliance Report Due
notifications.description: The Q1 compliance report for your teams is due in 5 days. Current aggregate compliance: 78%. Action required.

notifications.title: AWS DevOps Professional Renewal Window
notifications.description: Your AWS Certified DevOps Engineer - Professional certification expires in 85 days. Consider scheduling your recertification exam.
